com.hula.lang.runtime.exception

Class UndefinedVariableException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • com.hula.lang.runtime.exception.HulaPlayerException
          • com.hula.lang.runtime.exception.UndefinedVariableException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class UndefinedVariableException
extends HulaPlayerException
    An exception caused by a reference in a Hula script to an unknown variable.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
